<item>
  <title>Mary Beard posts tearful picture of herself after defence of Oxfam aid workers provokes backlash</title>
  <link>http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/home-news/mary-beard-tweet-oxfam-aid-workers-sex-scandal-backlash-feminists-cambridge-priyamvada-gopal-latest-a8216306.html</link>
  <description><![CDATA[Academic was criticised both for the original tweet and for 'manipulative' photo]]></description>
